definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to pour beans out of a bamboo tube/to come clean/to make a clean breast of things

sentences.english: "My mother cooks beans, " said a boy.
sentences.chinese: 另外一個同學說“我媽媽炒豆子”。

sentences.english: His head was kind of pinched on top like a deer's, and he had beady eyes like a rat.
sentences.chinese: 他的頭頂很尖，像鹿一樣還有像鼠一樣的豆子眼。

sentences.english: Rattling around like four peas in a pod.
sentences.chinese: 我們就像被夾在豆莢裏的四顆豆子，飄搖不定。

sentences.english: A bean in liberty is better than a comfit in prison.
sentences.chinese: 閒散的豆子總比監禁的糖果要強。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for determination of the total flavonoids contents in Complex Prescription Kudouzi Granules.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立測定複方苦豆子顆粒中總生黃酮含量的方法。

sentences.english: It is an Importer and Exporter. Buy dried chili , Dried bean…
sentences.chinese: 美國公司求購幹辣椒，幹豆子，脫水大蒜。

sentences.english: I like them in chili, soups, tacos and more.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡辣味豆子，用豆子做湯或者做成玉米麪豆卷。

sentences.english: I like them in chili, soups, tacos and more.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡辣味豆子，用豆子做湯或者做成玉米麪豆卷。

sentences.english: Wan DaJi wu min appease beans, suddenly a bomb.
sentences.chinese: 萬大齊吳敏安撫豆子，突然炸彈爆炸。

sentences.english: One cooked cupful can provide as much as 17 g fiber.
sentences.chinese: 一滿杯煮熟的豆子可以提供高達17克纖維。

sentences.english: A machine sizes the peas after they came from the fields.
sentences.chinese: 有一種機器把從田裏收來的豆子依大小分開。

sentences.english: The number 5 with frankfurters and beans, please.
sentences.chinese: 來份5號餐加香腸和豆子。

sentences.english: The tooltip for Tower of Radiance indicated that Holy Light would generate a charge of Holy Power. This has been fixed.
sentences.chinese: 光輝之塔天賦不再提示聖光術對道標使用會產生豆子。

sentences.english: Do the coffee beans have a little pink skin covering them or inside the crack of the bean?
sentences.chinese: 豆子夾縫中或是表面上是否有粉紅色的銀皮覆蓋住呢？

sentences.english: We got corn. And so on. And so on.
sentences.chinese: 我們要的是豆子，他卻拿來了玉米。

sentences.english: Stir the chickpeas and sprinkle over the paprika.
sentences.chinese: 將豆子充分攪拌好並撒上辣椒。

definition: variant of 包穀|包谷[bao1 gu3]
broad bean (Vicia faba)/fava bean/also written 蠶豆|蚕豆[can2 dou4]
